import React, { useState } from "react"; import 'font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css'; import "./Home.css" import mission from "../assets/Mission.png" import vision from "../assets/Vision.png" import srilanka from "../assets/SriLanka.png" import bike3 from "../assets/bike3.png" import bike5 from "../assets/bike5.jpg" import 'bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css'; import { Carousel } from "react-bootstrap"; import { FaBox } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Home = () => { const [locationClicked, setLocationClicked] = useState(false); const handleLocateNowClick = () => { setLocationClicked(!locationClicked); console.log('Locate Now button clicked!'); }; const services = [ { title: 'Product Catalog Management', description: 'Easily manage and update your CHAGA Tea product catalog. Add new tea variants, update existing product details, and keep your customers informed about the latest offerings.', }, { title: 'Inventory Tracking and Ordering', description: 'Stay on top of your tea inventory with our real-time tracking and ordering system. Receive low stock alerts, streamline purchase orders, and maintain optimal stock levels.', icon: 'icon-2', }, { title: 'Customer Engagement and Sales Analysis', description: 'Understand your customers better and boost sales with our customer engagement tools. Analyze customer preferences, launch targeted promotions, and gather valuable insights to tailor your CHAGA Tea offerings. ', icon: 'icon-3', }, ]; return (

Through innovative technology and a commitment to excellence, we aim to create a community where riders feel confident and inspired to explore their passion for two-wheel adventures

Our Vision

Revolutionizing Riding Experiences, One Reservation at a Time.

We envision a future where every motorbike owner experiences the thrill of the road without any concerns about maintenance or service.
